name: Expert Tax - Minimum Qualifying Salary
description: Expert Tax minimum monthly salary SEK 113,000 × 12 = SEK 1,356,000 annual in Stockholm

sources.description: Expert Tax at minimum qualifying salary threshold. SEK 113,000/month is the fixed salary route for automatic qualification
sources.notes: Gross after 25% exemption: 1,017,000. Taxable: 1,017,000 - 17,300 = 999,700. Municipal tax: 999,700 × 30.60% = 305,908. State tax: (999,700 - 625,800) × 20% = 74,780. Work credit: 0 (too high income). Total tax: ~276,000. Net: ~1,080,000
